com.geekabyte.jprowork

Class Project

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geekabyte.jprowork.Project

  • public class Project
extends java.lang.Object
    The Java object representation of a Project on Prowork.

      • getProjectActivity

        public java.util.List<Activity> getProjectActivity()
                                            throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Method to get a list of unread activities associated with this project object.
        Returns:
        List A list of Prowork Activity objects
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException - if an error occurs while retrieving projects Activities.
        See Also:
        Activity

      • getProjectActivity

        public java.util.List<Activity> getProjectActivity(int read)
                                            throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Method to get a list of activities associated with this project object.
        Parameters:
        read - Optional. By default, only unread activity messages are returned. To include read messages, set this parameter to 1
        Returns:
        List A list of Prowork Activity objects
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException - if an error occurs while retrieving projects Activities.
        See Also:
        Activity
